descriptionHtml:
Hi guys I am new to modding and this is my very first mod I will try to keep this up to date and add pics for u guys.

But for the description of this mod what I have basically done is made Iona blonde and a new hairstyle I am also in the process of making her a spellsword rather than a normal boring housecarl. I have also changed her to the keeper carcette outfit to match her new class style and because the purple robes match the colors of riften.
author: trevorgangster
